text: - [Narrator] You build your apps

using multiple AWS services.
(gentle inspirational music)

With AWS Backup, you can
centrally automate data protection

and compliance for your
applications that store data
in Amazon S3 and other AWS services.
You can create separable, protected,
immutable backups of your S3 buckets
across AWS regions and accounts

for your compliance and
data protection needs.
If problems arise,

you can easily restore backups
of your S3 buckets as objects

or other AWS services to
your chosen point in time,
all with one click.
(gentle inspirational music continues)
Additionally, you can monitor compliance
of your data protection policies

and demonstrate it using
auditor-ready reports.
Save time, avoid the manual processes,
and focus on your applications.
No matter what size or scale,

AWS Backup makes it easier
for the backup administrators

to ensure that your organization
can be back in business.
